Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians have won the first two games in this series by scores of 4-2 and 7-1.
The Guardians are 80-59 this year and they have won three games in a row.
The Royals are 75-65 this season and they have lost seven games in a row.
The projected starting pitcher for Cleveland is Ben Lively, who is 11-8 with a 3.92 ERA and a 1.23 WHIP over 131.0 innings pitched this year.
The projected starting pitcher for Kansas City is Seth Lugo, who is 14-8 with a 3.12 ERA and a 1.12 WHIP over 179.0 innings pitched this season.
